title: Apollo
description: The first time we met, I was rescuing her from a cult. The second time I laid eyes on her was when she showed up at Cerberus with a secret, asking me for an unthinkable favor. What she was offering was something I never thought I could have, so I readily agreed. I wanted more than just her secret though. How can I convince my wife to fall in love with me when someone else is threatening to take it all away? Contains mature themes.
author: Marie  James
